revenue.notes: Record Data Center run despite export-control headwinds on H20

gross_margin.notes: Includes $4.5B H20 inventory/purchase obligation charge tied to China export controls

operating_expenses.notes: R&D and SG&A rose on continued AI infrastructure investments

net_income.notes: Includes $4.5B non-cash write-down tied to H20 export restriction

gross_margin.adjusted_for: Excludes H20 charge (71.3% margin would have been achieved)

operating_expenses.notes: Adjusts out stock-based comp and acquisition-related costs

eps.notes: 0.96 adjusted excluding H20 charge & tax impact

highlights: Blackwell NVLink72 ramps fastest in company history with GB200 systems powering inference-heavy workloads
Inference token generation skyrocketing tenfold year-over-year and AI factories scaling globally
Export control on H20 trimmed ~$8B revenue run-rate because licensing now required for China
Record gaming revenue as RTX 5070/5060 families and DLSS 4 drive adoption; Nintendo Switch 2 uses NVIDIA AI chips

Professional_Visualization.notes: DGX Spark/Station and RTX Pro Blackwell demand staying resilient

Automotive_and_Robotics.notes: Partnerships with GM, Hyundai, and humanoid initiatives (Isaac GR00T) fueling growth

Blackwell_and_inference: GB200 NVL72 systems accessible to CSPs, sovereigns, and enterprise AI factories with NVLink 72 delivering 130 TB/sec bandwidth
GB300 samples started shipping while GB200 remains the large-scale inference workhorse delivering 30x MLPerf lift
networking: Spectrum-X/Ethernet is annualizing >$8B with new CSP wins (Google Cloud, Meta) plus Quantum-X photonics switches
NVLink Fusion, NVLink switches, and BlueField DPUs expand scale-up/scale-out control planes
gaming_and_consumer: Blackwell-powered RTX 50-series desktops and laptops expand AI/graphics experiences; DLSS 4 running in 125+ titles
sovereign_and_physical_ai: Announced AI factories with Saudi Arabia, UAE, Foxconn, and Singapore partners plus Omniverse blueprints for industrial operations
Automotive/robotics wins include GM collaboration, Mercedes-Benz deployment, and Isaac GR00T humanoid models

q2_guidance.other_income: ≈0.45 billion USD income excluding non-marketable equity volatility

longer_term.capex: Mid-30% growth rate for FY26 with >$30B Q1 guide; mix shifts toward short-lived assets and finance leases
longer_term.geography: China data center revenue will meaningfully decline next quarter due to export controls; onshore manufacturing and partnerships accelerate to offset
longer_term.networking: Expectation that NVLink/Spectrum-X adoption continues to grow double digits
